snippet.title: Blade Runner: Revelations VR Game Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Blade Runner: Revelations is available exclusively on the Daydream Platform.  Play now on the Lenovo Mirage Solo headset and Daydream View!

Download it on the Google Play Store:  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.alconinteractive.brvr
